name: BENSON ZION & ASSOCIATES, Petitioner, v. Stephen and Marguerite J. LAGROSSA, Respondent
docket_number: Petition for Allowance of Appeal No. 785 Eastern District Allocatur Docket 1995

parties: BENSON ZION & ASSOCIATES, Petitioner, v. Stephen and Marguerite J. LAGROSSA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of April, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and limited to the issue of whether the Superior Court properly addressed the imposition of costs. This is to be submitted on briefs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
673 A.2d 922
BENSON ZION & ASSOCIATES, Petitioner, v. Stephen and Marguerite J. LAGROSSA, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 23, 1996.
